headline: How Zebra Technologies Is Dodging Tariff Costs While Others Panic
summary: Tariffs are coming, but Zebra Technologies is ready to dodge them. Here's how the strategic actions it took in response to the COVID-19 pandemic are paying off in unexpected ways.
